bwwExcerpt: All that emotion bubbles beneath a campy, laugh-aloud, cringe-a-little musical with killer sets, wild costumes, and eye-popping effects, choreography, lighting, props, puppetry (hello, Sandworm!) — the whole shebang. It’s just plain fun. And this touring cast is terrific.
